replies.body: Pantheon's new Slayer Skin has Dead Rising's Chainsaw-Ductaped-to-Paddle.

And?
That's not a unique concept from Dead Rising.
And neither is this dragon. A few edits here and there and all it is legally is a reference.
A Tigrex is definitely unique to something.

OMG I JUST THOUGHT OF A FUN SKIN FOR SHYVANNA!!!!...

It technically doesn't have anything to do with this idea per se.  But I'd like you to imagine for a moment.  Zombie Shyvanna...where she turns into a big bad zombie BA.  She is just a little zombie before then BAM!!! Super Zombie!!!.
